3.featuretextwithbullet: Gunsmith - You can use Tinker's Tools to craft ammo, repair firearms, or design new ones.

3.featuretext: -Max Grit points equal to Wis mod. Regain all Grit after short or long rest
-Regain 1 Grit point on a critical hit. (crit must be from an attack roll, not granted via status effect)
-Regain 1 Grit point when dealing the final blow to an enemy.

3.featuretextwithbullet: Deadeye Shot - Spend 1 Grit point to gain advantage on the next attack roll made with a firearm this round.

7.featuretext:
-Add proficiency bonus to initiative.
    - You can stow and draw a firearm with the same object interaction.

7.featuretextwithbullet: Violent Shot - Spend 1 or more Grit points before making an attack roll. For each Grit spent, add +2 to the weapon's misfire score. If the attack hits, the damage is increased by 1 die per Grit.

10.featuretextwithbullet: Trick Shot - Spend 1 Grit point before attacking to target a body part, giving the attack an effect in addition to the normal damage. DC: 8 + Proficiency + Dex Mod. Effects for each body part:

10.featuretext: -Head: Target makes a Con save or has disadvantage on all attacks until the end of their next turn.
-Arms: Target makes a Str save or drops a held item.
-Torso: Target is pushed 10 ft away from you.
-Legs/Wings: Target makes Str save or knocked prone.

15.featuretextwithbullet: Lightning Reload: Can now reload a firearm as a bonus action.

Piercing Shot - Spend 1 Grit point before making an attack. If the attack hits, make an attack roll against every creature in a line within the weapon's first range value. The firearm can only misfire on the initial shot.

18.featuretextwithbullet: Vicious Intent - Your attacks with firearms score critical hits on a roll of 19 or 20.
Hemorrhaging Critical: When you score a critical hit with a firearm, the target takes extra damage equal to half of the attack's damage at the end of its next turn.
